description: c4, stands for Connect Four, is a browser game written in TypeScript and utilizes HTML's canvas. Player is playing against an AI that uses the Minimax algorithm and alpha-beta pruning. The evaluation function is hard-coded, and hence the AI may not be moving using the most optimal move.

tasks.task_description: Improve AI's decision-making by enhancing the evaluation function.
Implement a new visual effect when a player wins (e.g., flashing winning pieces).
Add an option for the player to choose the AI difficulty (easy, medium, hard).
Allow players to customize the board size (e.g., from 7x6 to other sizes).
Improve performance by optimizing canvas rendering techniques.
Refactor code to improve readability and maintainability, especially in AI logic.
Add sound effects for placing a piece and for winning the game.
Implement a save and load game feature for players to continue later.
Create a multiplayer mode allowing two players to play over a network.
Add an animated background or theme selection for the game board.
